Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewUpdaterObservable, DisconnectObservable, ChooseDraftDieValueObserver, DecreaseDieValueObserver, DraftAndPlaceAgainObserver, DraftAndPlaceNoAdjacentObserver, DraftAndPlaceObserver, EndTurnObserver, FlipDraftDieObserver, GameEventObserver, IncreaseDieValueObserver, MoveDieIgnoreColorRestrictionObserver, MoveDieIgnoreValueRestrictionObserver, MoveDieMatchColorRoundTrackObserver, MoveDieRespectAllRestrictionsObserver, ReconnectObserver, RerollAllDraftDiceObserver, RerollDraftDieObserver, StartGameObserver, SwapDraftDieWithDiceBagDieObserver, SwapDraftDieWithRoundTrackDieObserver, UseToolCardObserver, WindowPatternChosenObserver

extends java.lang.Object
implements GameEventObserver, ViewUpdaterObservable, ReconnectObserver, DisconnectObservable

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(ChooseDraftDieValueGameEvent event)
        Handle a choose draft die value game event. Check if the tool card let the player play this effect. After checking all conditions it change the value of a draft die with the a new value.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface ChooseDraftDieValueObserver
        Parameters:
        event - the choose draft die value game event.

      • handle

        public void handle(DecreaseDieValueGameEvent event)
        Handle a decrease die value game event. Check if the tool card let the player play this effect. After checking all conditions it decrease the value of the die.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface DecreaseDieValueObserver
        Parameters:
        event - the decrease die value game event.

      • handle

        public void handle(DraftAndPlaceAgainGameEvent event)
        Handle a draft and place again game event. Check if the tool card let the player play this effect and check if it is the first turn of the round. After checking all conditions, let the player draft and place again after his first turn. Remove the next occurrence of the player in the scheduler queue.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface DraftAndPlaceAgainObserver
        Parameters:
        event - the draft and place again game event.

      • handle

        public void handle(DraftAndPlaceNoAdjacentGameEvent event)
        Handle a draft and place no adjacent game event. Check if the tool card let the player play this effect and the placement is legal. After checking all conditions, let the player draft and place a die in a space that has no adjacent spaces with dice.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface DraftAndPlaceNoAdjacentObserver
        Parameters:
        event - the draft and place no adjacent game event.

      • handle

        public void handle(DraftAndPlaceGameEvent event)
        Handle a draft and place game event. Check if the player can draft and place. After checking all conditions, let the player draft and place a die in a space, respecting all restrictions.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface DraftAndPlaceObserver
        Parameters:
        event - the draft and place game event.

      • handle

        public void handle(EndTurnGameEvent event)
        Handle an end turn event. Check if the player can end the turn. After checking all conditions, let the player and go to next turn.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface EndTurnObserver
        Parameters:
        event - the end turn event.

      • handle

        public void handle(FlipDraftDieGameEvent event)
        Handle a flip drafted die game event. Check if the tool card let the player play this effect. After checking all conditions, let the player flip a die in the draft pool.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface FlipDraftDieObserver
        Parameters:
        event - the flip drafted die game event.

        public void handle(MoveDieIgnoreColorRestrictionGameEvent event)
        Handle a move die ignore color restriction event. Check if the tool card let the player play this effect and check if the move is legal. After checking all conditions move the die ignoring the space color restriction.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface MoveDieIgnoreColorRestrictionObserver
        Parameters:
        event - the move die ignore color restriction event.

      • handle

        public void handle(MoveDieMatchColorRoundTrackGameEvent event)
        Handle a move die that match the color of a die in the round track event. Check if the tool card let the player play this effect, check if the move is legal and check if the selected die match the color of a die in the round track. After checking all conditions move the die.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface MoveDieMatchColorRoundTrackObserver
        Parameters:
        event - the move die that match the color of a die in the round track event.

      • handle

        public void handle(RerollAllDraftDiceGameEvent event)
        Handle a reroll all draft pool dice game event. Check if the tool card let the player play this effect. After checking all conditions reroll every dice im the draft pool.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface RerollAllDraftDiceObserver
        Parameters:

        public void handle(UseToolCardGameEvent event)
        Handle a use tool card event. Check if the player can use a tool card and check if he has enough favor tokens. After checking all conditions, activate the tool card and spend player's favor tokens.
        Specified by:
